title: Teacher Training Program for Enhancing Self-Directed Learning Design Capabilities in Digital Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational college teaching methods and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment primarily utilizing smartphones for current science faculty instructors

learning_goals: Learners can design assessment rubrics that promote self-directed learning in digital environments.
Learners can analyze learner engagement patterns and build feedback systems using learning analytics tools.
Learners can understand differences in teacher behavior types based on experience levels and develop personalized instructional strategies.
Learners can measure learning effectiveness using project-based assessment tools in blended environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
